post.post_title: The Mighty and Mysterious Gods and Goddesses of Wind
post.blurb: Before science enabled us to understand the phenomena of earth's environment, humankind struggled to explain the uncontrollable, magical, terrible, wondrous, destructive, sustaining, frightening, chaotic and often seemingly random forces of nature.
